name: Meeting Links Extension
author: Farhan Hilmi
description: Extension to save your link meeting links so they can be easily managed and accessed in your browser!
content_security_policy: default-src *; script-src-elem * 'unsafe-inline'; style-src * 'unsafe-inline'; script-src 'self' *.cdnjs.cloudflare.com 'unsafe-eval' ; font-src *; object-src 'self'
